title: BBC Radio 5 Live - The Wayne Rooney Show, Pressure On Amorim But Grealish & Dowman Both Star
description: Wayne Rooney on Ruben Amorim’s pressure, Grealish’s impact, & Max Dowman’s debut wonder.
content:
With just one point from Manchester United’s first two games, Wayne Rooney dives into the growing pressure on Ruben Amorim alongside host Kelly Somers and comedian and football fan, Kae Kurd. How long does Amorim have to steady the ship?

Everton celebrated their first win at their new stadium, and Wayne breaks down Jack Grealish’s instant impact who brought a fresh edge to the team.

Meanwhile, over at Arsenal, 15-year-old Max Dowman lit up his debut with a performance beyond his years. Wayne reflects on the wonderkid’s rise and shares stories from his own teenage breakthrough including first cars, quick driving tests, and getting lifts to training from none other than Big Dunc himself!
summary: The Wayne Rooney Show, The Wayne Wayne Show, discusses the growing pressure on Manchester United manager, Ruben Amorim, and the impact of Jack Grealish on the team. The show also discusses Everton's first win at their new stadium. Meanwhile, 15-year-old Max Dowman performed well in his debut for the club.
shortSummary: Wayne Rooney discusses the growing pressure on Ruben Amorim and his team's performance, while discussing Jack Grealish's impact on Everton and Max Dowman's debut performances.
